query:
SELECT v.id, v.formandoId, f.nome as formando_nome, f.turmaId, 
       DATE_FORMAT(v.dataVenda, '%d/%m/%Y') as data_venda,
       v.valorTotal / 100 as valor_bruto,
       v.valorLiquido / 100 as valor_liquido,
       v.status
FROM vendas v 
LEFT JOIN formandos f ON v.formandoId = f.id 
WHERE v.excluido = 0
  AND DATE(v.dataVenda) = '2026-06-15'
  AND (f.turmaId IS NULL OR f.nome IS NULL)
ORDER BY v.id
command:

       DATE_FORMAT(v.dataVenda, '%d/%m/%Y') as data_venda,
       v.valorTotal / 100 as valor_bruto,
       v.valorLiquido / 100 as valor_liquido,
       v.status
FROM vendas v 
LEFT JOIN formandos f ON v.formandoId = f.id 
WHERE v.excluido = 0
  AND DATE(v.dataVenda) = '2026-06-15'
  AND (f.turmaId IS NULL OR f.nome IS NULL)
ORDER BY v.id
